nodes.bodyText: Consider adding a comment to _prunedSerialNum as well.

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,19 @@

+
+#pragma once
+
+#include <vespa/searchlib/common/serialnum.h>
+
+namespace proton {
+
+/**
+ * A simple interface for increasing a serial number and getting the new
+ * serial number.
+ **/
+class IIncSerialNum {
+public:
+    virtual ~IIncSerialNum() = default;
+    virtual search::SerialNum incSerialNum() = 0;
